subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Loren Roberts made a 29-foot double-breaking birdie putt on the par-5 17th hole in the Commerce Bank Championship in East Meadow, N.Y., and he went on to win his first Champions Tour event this year. Roberts bogeyed the closing hole, but his three-under 68 gave him a 12-under 201 total and a one-stroke victory over Nick Price and Lonnie Nielsen. Roberts won his eighth event on the Champions Tour, the same total he had in his PGA Tour career. He has three second-place finishes on the Champions Tour this year, including last week, when he finished behind Jeff Sluman.
